name: Ability Checks
description: To make an ability check, roll a d20 and add the relevant ability modifier plus proficiency if appropriate.

name: Saving Throws
description: Saving throws represent a heroic effort to resist a spell, trap, or other hazard; roll a d20 plus the relevant modifier.

name: Advantage and Disadvantage
description: When a situation grants advantage, roll two d20 and use the higher result; disadvantage uses the lower result.
